text: Section 1 Key Responsibilities (a) Survival benefit: starting from policy year 5 pay 30% of base sum assured each year. (b) Maturity benefit: at age 100 pay 120% of accumulated premium.

3. Sample continued clause (cont.) This appendix standardizes claim material submission. Incomplete files must be supplemented within three d (cont.) When third-party reimbursement applies, attach original invoices and explanations.

Chapter 2 Liability Description A. Retirement responsibilities Annual survival benefits pay 35% of base sumassured; quick-return option refunds from year three with smoothing bonus linked to asset pool results.
1. War or nuclear events are excluded; B. Exclusions
2. Intentional self-injury or criminal acts void benefits. (1) Policy document; (2) Identity proof; (3) C. Claim materials Medical diagnosis; (4) Receipts.
